verses.verse: פַּלְגֵי־ <S%H6388><s%> [as] the rivers מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water לֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> heart מֶ֭לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king's בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> [is] in the hand יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he יַחְפֹּ֣ץ <S%H2654><s%> it whithersoever he will יַטֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H5186><s%> he turneth כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner דֶּרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> along

אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of a man יָשָׁ֣ר <S%H3477><s%> [is] right בְּעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> in his own eyes וְתֹכֵ֖ן <S%H8505><s%> pondereth לִבּ֣וֹת <S%H3826><s%> the hearts יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD

עֲ֭שֹׂה <S%H6213><s%> To do צְדָקָ֣ה <S%H6666><s%> justice וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> and judgment נִבְחָ֖ר <S%H977><s%> [is] more acceptable לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD מִזָּֽבַח׃ <S%H2077><s%> than sacrifice

רוּם־ <S%H7311><s%> bring up עֵ֭ינַיִם <S%H5869><s%> look וּרְחַב־ <S%H7342><s%> and a proud לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> heart נִ֖ר <S%H5215><s%> [and] the plowing רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked חַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> [is] sin

מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <S%H4284><s%> The thoughts חָ֭רוּץ <S%H2742><s%> of the diligent אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> surely לְמוֹתָ֑ר <S%H4195><s%> [tend] only to plenteousness וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone אָ֝֗ץ <S%H213><s%> but of every one [that is] hasty אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> surely לְמַחְסֽוֹר׃ <S%H4270><s%> only to want

פֹּ֣עַל <S%H6467><s%> The getting א֭וֹצָרוֹת <S%H214><s%> of treasures בִּלְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> by a lying הֶ֥בֶל <S%H1892><s%> [is] a vanity נִ֝דָּ֗ף <S%H5086><s%> tossed to and fro of מְבַקְשֵׁי־ <S%H1245><s%> them that seek מָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> death

שֹׁד־ <S%H7701><s%> The robbery רְשָׁעִ֥ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יְגוֹרֵ֑ם <S%H1641><s%> shall destroy כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because מֵ֝אֲנ֗וּ <S%H3985><s%> them because they refuse לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> judgment

הֲפַכְפַּ֬ךְ <S%H2019><s%> [is] froward דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> The way אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of man וָזָ֑ר <S%H2054><s%> and strange וְ֝זַ֗ךְ <S%H2134><s%> but [as for] the pure יָשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> [is] right פָּעֳלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6467><s%> his work

ט֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [It is] better לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פִּנַּת־ <S%H6438><s%> in a corner גָּ֑ג <S%H1406><s%> of the housetop מֵאֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> woman מִ֝דְיָנִ֗ים <S%H4079><s%> brawling וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house חָֽבֶר׃ <S%H2267><s%> in a wide

נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> The soul רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked אִוְּתָה־ <S%H183><s%> desireth רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> evil לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יֻחַ֖ן <S%H2603><s%> findeth no favour בְּעֵינָ֣יו <S%H5869><s%> in his eyes רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour

בַּעְנָשׁ־ <S%H6064><s%> is punished לֵ֭ץ <S%H3887><s%> When the scorner יֶחְכַּם־ <S%H2449><s%> is made wise פֶּ֑תִי <S%H6612><s%> the simple וּבְהַשְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H7919><s%> is instructed לְ֝חָכָ֗ם <S%H2450><s%> and when the wise יִקַּח־ <S%H3947><s%> he receiveth דָּֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> knowledge

מַשְׂכִּ֣יל <S%H7919><s%> [man] wisely considereth צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> The righteous לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked מְסַלֵּ֖ף <S%H5557><s%> [but God] overthroweth רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> the wicked לָרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> for [their] wickedness

אֹטֵ֣ם <S%H331><s%> Whoso stoppeth אָ֭זְנוֹ <S%H241><s%> his ears מִזַּעֲקַת־ <S%H2201><s%> at the cry דָּ֑ל <S%H1800><s%> of the poor גַּֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself יִ֝קְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> he also shall cry וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵעָנֶֽה׃ <S%H6030><s%> himself but shall not be heard

מַתָּ֣ן <S%H4976><s%> A gift בַּ֭סֵּתֶר <S%H5643><s%> in secret יִכְפֶּה־ <S%H3711><s%> pacifieth אָ֑ף <S%H639><s%> anger וְשֹׁ֥חַד <S%H7810><s%> and a reward בַּ֝חֵ֗ק <S%H2436><s%> in the bosom חֵמָ֥ה <S%H2534><s%> wrath עַזָּֽה׃ <S%H5794><s%> strong

שִׂמְחָ֣ה <S%H8057><s%> [It is] joy לַ֭צַּדִּיק <S%H6662><s%> to the just עֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּ֝מְחִתָּ֗ה <S%H4288><s%> but destruction לְפֹ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> [shall be] to the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> of iniquity

אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> The man תּ֭וֹעֶה <S%H8582><s%> that wandereth מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> out of the way הַשְׂכֵּ֑ל <S%H7919><s%> of understanding בִּקְהַ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> in the congregation רְפָאִ֣ים <S%H7496><s%> of the dead יָנֽוּחַ׃ <S%H5117><s%> shall remain

אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man מַ֭חְסוֹר <S%H4270><s%> [shall be] a poor אֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> He that loveth שִׂמְחָ֑ה <S%H8057><s%> pleasure אֹהֵ֥ב <S%H157><s%> he that loveth יַֽיִן־ <S%H3196><s%> wine וָ֝שֶׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and oil לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not יַעֲשִֽׁיר׃ <S%H6238><s%> shall not be rich

כֹּ֣פֶר <S%H3724><s%> [shall be] a ransom לַצַּדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> for the righteous רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> The wicked וְתַ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> the place יְשָׁרִ֣ים <S%H3477><s%> for the upright בּוֹגֵֽד׃ <S%H898><s%> and the transgressor

ט֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [It is] better שֶׁ֥בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> land מִדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> A desert מֵאֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> woman [מְדֹונִים כ] (מִדְיָנִ֣ים <S%H4066><s%> brawling ק) וָכָֽעַס׃ <S%H3708><s%> and an angry

אוֹצָ֤ר ׀ <S%H214><s%> [There is] treasure נֶחְמָ֣ד <S%H2530><s%> to be desired וָ֭שֶׁמֶן <S%H8081><s%> and oil בִּנְוֵ֣ה <S%H5116><s%> in the dwelling חָכָ֑ם <S%H2450><s%> of the wise וּכְסִ֖יל <S%H3684><s%> but a foolish אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> man יְבַלְּעֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H1104><s%> spendeth it up

רֹ֭דֵף <S%H7291><s%> He that followeth צְדָקָ֣ה <S%H6666><s%> after righteousness וָחָ֑סֶד <S%H2617><s%> and mercy יִמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> findeth חַ֝יִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> life צְדָקָ֥ה <S%H6666><s%> righteousness וְכָבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> and honour

עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> the city גִּ֭בֹּרִים <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> [man] scaleth חָכָ֑ם <S%H2450><s%> A wise וַ֝יֹּ֗רֶד <S%H3381><s%> and casteth down עֹ֣ז <S%H5797><s%> the strength מִבְטֶחָֽה׃ <S%H4009><s%> of the confidence

שֹׁמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> Whoso keepeth פִּ֭יו <S%H6310><s%> his mouth וּלְשׁוֹנ֑וֹ <S%H3956><s%> and his tongue שֹׁמֵ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> keepeth מִצָּר֣וֹת <S%H6869><s%> from troubles נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> his soul

זֵ֣ד <S%H2086><s%> Proud יָ֭הִיר <S%H3093><s%> [and] haughty לֵ֣ץ <S%H3887><s%> scorner שְׁמ֑וֹ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name ע֝וֹשֶׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> who dealeth בְּעֶבְרַ֥ת <S%H5678><s%> wrath זָדֽוֹן׃ <S%H2087><s%> in proud

תַּאֲוַ֣ת <S%H8378><s%> The desire עָצֵ֣ל <S%H6102><s%> of the slothful תְּמִיתֶ֑נּוּ <S%H4191><s%> killeth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מֵאֲנ֖וּ <S%H3985><s%> refuse יָדָ֣יו <S%H3027><s%> him for his hands לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> to labour

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַ֭יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day הִתְאַוָּ֣ה <S%H183><s%> He coveteth תַאֲוָ֑ה <S%H8378><s%> greedily וְצַדִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> long but the righteous יִ֝תֵּ֗ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not יַחְשֹֽׂךְ׃ <S%H2820><s%> and spareth

זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> The sacrifice רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked תּוֹעֵבָ֑ה <S%H8441><s%> [is] abomination אַ֝֗ף <S%H637><s%> How כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when בְזִמָּ֥ה <S%H2154><s%> evil יְבִיאֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> how much more [when] he bringeth

עֵד־ <S%H5707><s%> witness כְּזָבִ֥ים <S%H3577><s%> A false יֹאבֵ֑ד <S%H6><s%> shall perish וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> but the man שׁ֝וֹמֵ֗עַ <S%H8085><s%> that heareth לָנֶ֥צַח <S%H5331><s%> constantly יְדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> speaketh

הֵעֵ֬ז <S%H5810><s%> hardeneth אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man רָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> A wicked בְּפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> his face וְ֝יָשָׁ֗ר <S%H3477><s%> but [as for] the upright ה֤וּא ׀ <S%H1931><s%> he [יָכִין כ] (יָבִ֬ין <S%H3559><s%> certain ק) [דְּרָכָיו כ] (דַּרְכֹּֽו׃ <S%H1870><s%> along ק)

אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> There חָ֭כְמָה <S%H2451><s%> [There is] no wisdom וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is no תְּבוּנָ֑ה <S%H8394><s%> nor understanding וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and no עֵ֝צָ֗ה <S%H6098><s%> nor counsel לְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> against יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God פ

ס֗וּס <S%H5483><s%> The horse מ֭וּכָן <S%H3559><s%> [is] prepared לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> against the day מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> of battle וְ֝לַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] of the LORD הַתְּשׁוּעָֽה׃ <S%H8668><s%> but safety
